colleges.name: IIT Bombay
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Bombay is a public technical and research university located in Powai, Mumbai. It is a premier engineering institution in India.

colleges.name: IIT Delhi
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi is a public technical and research university located in Hauz Khas, Delhi. It is globally recognized for its engineering programs.

colleges.name: IIT Madras
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Madras is a public technical and research university located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu and is known for its strong engineering and technology programs.

colleges.name: NIT Trichy
colleges.description: National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli is a public technical and research university with a reputation for excellence in engineering and technology.

colleges.name: NIT Surathkal
colleges.description: National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal is a public engineering university at Surathkal, Mangalore. It is one of India's premier technical universities.

colleges.name: BITS Pilani
colleges.description: Birla Institute of Technology & Science, Pilani is a private deemed university in Pilani, India. It is known for its flexible academic structure and strong industry linkages.

colleges.name: IIIT Hyderabad
colleges.description: The International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad is a private deemed university located in Hyderabad, Telangana, known for its research in IT and computer science.

colleges.name: Jadavpur University
colleges.description: Jadavpur University is a public technical university located in Kolkata, West Bengal. It has been cited as one of the best universities in India.

colleges.name: Lovely Professional University (LPU)
colleges.description: Lovely Professional University is a private university situated in Chaheru, Phagwara, Punjab, India. It is one of the largest single-campus universities in India.

colleges.name: Chitkara University
colleges.description: Chitkara University is a private university located in Rajpura, Punjab, India. It offers undergraduate programs, post-graduate program and doctoral programs in varied fields.

colleges.name: IIM Ahmedabad
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad is a business school located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. As one of India's premier IIMs, it is consistently ranked as one of the best business schools in India.

colleges.name: IIM Bangalore
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore is a public business school located in Bangalore, Karnataka, India. Founded in 1973, it was the third IIM to be established.

colleges.name: IIM Calcutta
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Calcutta is a public business school located in Joka, Kolkata, West Bengal, India. It was the first Indian Institute of Management to be established.

colleges.name: SP Jain Institute of Management & Research (SPJIMR)
colleges.description: S.P. Jain Institute of Management and Research is a private business school affiliated under Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan. SPJIMR sits on a 45-acre campus in the western suburbs of Andheri in Mumbai.

colleges.name: Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies (NMIMS)
colleges.description: Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies is a private deemed university located in Mumbai. The University also has campuses at Shirpur, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Indore and Navi Mumbai.

colleges.name: Symbiosis Institute of Business Management (SIBM Pune)
colleges.description: Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, Pune is a constituent of Symbiosis International. It is one of the top B-Schools in India.

colleges.name: Xavier Labour Relations Institute (XLRI Jamshedpur)
colleges.description: XLRI – Xavier School of Management is a private business school run by the Society of Jesus in Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India. It is one of the oldest business schools in India.

colleges.name: Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies (JBIMS)
colleges.description: Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies is a private business school in Mumbai, India. It is the Department of Management Studies of the University of Mumbai.

colleges.name: Amity University (MBA)
colleges.description: Amity University offers an MBA program known for its industry-oriented curriculum and large alumni network.

colleges.name: ICFAI Business School (IBS)
colleges.description: IBS has multiple campuses across India and is known for its case-study based learning approach for its MBA/PGPM programs.

colleges.name: AIIMS Delhi
colleges.description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi is a globally recognized medical college and hospital. It is the most sought-after medical college in India.

colleges.name: Christian Medical College (CMC Vellore)
colleges.description: Christian Medical College, Vellore is a private, minority-run medical school, hospital and research institute. It is a top-ranked medical institution in India.

colleges.name: Armed Forces Medical College (AFMC Pune)
colleges.description: The Armed Forces Medical College is a medical college in Pune, India, in the state of Maharashtra. The college is managed by the Indian Armed Forces.

colleges.name: Kasturba Medical College (KMC Manipal)
colleges.description: Kasturba Medical College, Manipal and Kasturba Medical College, Mangalore, together known as KMC, are two private medical colleges in coastal Karnataka, India.

colleges.name: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education & Research (JIPMER)
colleges.description: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research is a medical school located at Pondicherry, the capital of the Union Territory of Puducherry, in India.

colleges.name: Maulana Azad Medical College (MAMC Delhi)
colleges.description: Maulana Azad Medical College is a medical college in New Delhi, India affiliated to University of Delhi and run by the Delhi government.

colleges.name: Grant Medical College (Mumbai)
colleges.description: Grant Government Medical College, Mumbai is a public medical college, affixed to the J. J. Group of Hospitals in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

colleges.name: King George’s Medical University (KGMU Lucknow)
colleges.description: King George's Medical University, is a medical school, hospital, and medical university located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India.

colleges.name: DY Patil Medical College
colleges.description: DY Patil group has several private medical colleges across Maharashtra, known for modern infrastructure but with higher tuition fees.

colleges.name: Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth, Pune / Navi Mumbai (Private MBBS)
colleges.description: A deemed university in Pune and Navi Mumbai, offering various health science courses with a focus on private medical education.

colleges.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
colleges.description: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, MIT is a world leader in science and technology.

colleges.name: Stanford University
colleges.description: Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, Stanford is renowned for its entrepreneurial spirit and engineering programs.

colleges.name: University of Cambridge
colleges.description: One of the world's oldest and most prestigious universities, offering a rigorous and historic engineering program.

colleges.name: University of Toronto
colleges.description: Canada's top-ranked university, offering a diverse range of engineering specializations and a vibrant city life.

colleges.name: Georgia Institute of Technology (Georgia Tech)
colleges.description: A public research university and institute of technology in Atlanta, Georgia. It has a strong focus on co-op programs and research.

colleges.name: ETH Zürich
colleges.description: A science, technology, engineering, and mathematics university in Zürich, Switzerland. It's one of the leading universities in the world.

colleges.name: University of Melbourne
colleges.description: Australia's top university, known for its comprehensive curriculum and research-intensive environment.

colleges.name: Imperial College London
colleges.description: A public research university in London, specializing in science, engineering, medicine, and business.

colleges.name: University of Hertfordshire
colleges.description: A modern public university in Hertfordshire, UK, known for its strong links with industry and a practical approach to teaching.
colleges.eligibility: High School qualifications, English proficiency test

colleges.name: De Montfort University
colleges.description: A public university in Leicester, England, offering a range of creative and technical courses with a focus on employability.
colleges.eligibility: High School qualifications, English proficiency test

colleges.name: Harvard Business School (HBS)
colleges.description: The graduate business school of Harvard University, consistently ranked among the top business schools in the world.

colleges.name: The Wharton School
colleges.description: The business school of the University of Pennsylvania, renowned for its finance program and broad curriculum.

colleges.name: INSEAD
colleges.description: A graduate business school with locations in Europe (Fontainebleau, France), Asia (Singapore), and the Middle East (Abu Dhabi). Known for its one-year MBA program.

colleges.name: London Business School (LBS)
colleges.description: A leading global business school, part of the University of London, offering a highly respected MBA program.

colleges.name: Rotman School of Management
colleges.description: The business school at the University of Toronto, known for its focus on integrative thinking and leadership.

colleges.name: Kelley School of Business
colleges.description: The business school of Indiana University, known for its strong career services and collaborative environment.

colleges.name: HEC Paris
colleges.description: A leading business school in France, offering a range of programs with a strong international focus.

colleges.name: Saïd Business School
colleges.description: The business school of the University of Oxford, combining a historic academic setting with modern business education.

colleges.name: Coventry University (MBA)
colleges.description: A modern UK university with a focus on applied research and strong business links, offering an accessible MBA program.
colleges.eligibility: Bachelor's Degree, Work Experience, English Proficiency

colleges.name: Anglia Ruskin University
colleges.description: A UK university offering a variety of MBA specialisms with a focus on practical skills and leadership.
colleges.eligibility: Bachelor's Degree, Work Experience, English Proficiency

colleges.name: Harvard Medical School
colleges.description: The graduate medical school of Harvard University, a global leader in medical education and research.

colleges.name: Johns Hopkins School of Medicine
colleges.description: A leading medical school known for its groundbreaking research and patient care at Johns Hopkins Hospital.

colleges.name: University of Oxford Medical School
colleges.description: One of the oldest and most respected medical schools in the world, offering a traditional, research-intensive medical education.
courses: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (BM BCh)

colleges.name: University of Toronto Faculty of Medicine
colleges.description: Canada's leading medical school, offering a top-tier education with strong research opportunities.

colleges.name: University of Melbourne Medical School
colleges.description: Australia's top medical school, offering a graduate-entry Doctor of Medicine (MD) program.

colleges.name: Karolinska Institute
colleges.description: A research-led medical university in Stockholm, Sweden, one of the world's foremost medical schools.

colleges.name: Monash University
colleges.description: A leading Australian university with a highly-regarded medical program and a strong focus on research.

colleges.name: University College London (UCL) Medical School
colleges.description: One of the largest and most prestigious medical schools in the UK, located in the heart of London.

colleges.name: University of Debrecen
colleges.description: A popular choice for international students in Hungary, offering medical programs in English with more accessible entry requirements.

colleges.name: University of Latvia Faculty of Medicine
colleges.description: An affordable option in the EU for medical studies in English, attracting a large international student body.
